inclusion.criterion: probable Alzheimer disease, Parkinson disease, or frontotemporal dementia
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: current psychiatric disease, substance abuse or severe systemic disease
exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: no history of psychiatric disease or substance abuse mentioned

exclusion.criterion: laboratory tests with clinically significant abnormalities
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: subjects on blood-thinning medications, having coagulation disorders, or clinically significant abnormal blood clotting test (PT/PTT)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: prior participation in other research protocols or clinical care in the last year such that radiation exposure, including that from this protocol, would exceed the guidelines set by the Radiation Safety Committee (RSC)
exclusion.label: unknown
not_met
exclusion.evidence: no mention of pregnancy or breastfeeding

exclusion.criterion: positive result on urine screen for illicit drugs
exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: no mention of illicit drug use

exclusion.criterion: subjects who cannot lie on their back for extended periods of time
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: history of neurological disease other than Alzheimer disease, Parkinson disease, or frontotemporal dementia
exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: no mention of other neurological diseases

exclusion.criterion: subjects who have a cardiac pacemaker or metal in their body
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has a history of urological procedures, including suprapubic prostatectomy and urethral stricture. He is currently stable with good urine output.
